		<title>01</title>

		<wp:post_name>01</wp:post_name>
		<wp:status>inherit</wp:status>
		<wp:post_parent>1861</wp:post_parent>

		<wp:postmeta>

	<item>
		<title>Page with comments</title>
		<link>http://www.nhkeu.co.uk/?page_id=155</link>
		<pubDate>Tue, 04 Sep 2007 09:47:47 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[kevinhsu]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://wpthemetestdata.wordpress.com/page-with-comments/</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[Repository-hosted Themes are required to support display of comments on static Pages as well as on single blog Posts.  This static Page has comments, and these comments should be displayed.
If the Theme includes a custom option to prevent static Pages from displaying comments, such option must be disabled (i.e. so that static Pages display comments) by default.
Also, verify that this Page does not display taxonomy information (e.g. categories or tags) or time-stamp information (Page publish date/time).]]></content:encoded>

	<item>
		<title>Page with comments disabled</title>
		<link>http://www.nhkeu.co.uk/?page_id=156</link>
		<pubDate>Tue, 04 Sep 2007 09:48:10 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[kevinhsu]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://wpthemetestdata.wordpress.com/page-with-comments-disabled/</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[This static Page is set not to allow comments. Verify that the Page does not display a comment list, comment reply links, or comment reply form.
Also, verify that the Page does not display a "comments are closed" type message. Such messages are not suitable for static Pages, and should only be used on blog Posts.]]></content:encoded>
		<excerpt:encoded><![CDATA[]]></excerpt:encoded>

	<item>
		<title>Hero 2 items</title>
		<link>http://www.nhkeu.co.uk/?iapp_showcase=hero-2-items</link>
		<pubDate>Tue, 07 Oct 2014 14:04:28 +0000</pubDate>

		<excerpt:encoded><![CDATA[]]></excerpt:encoded>
		<wp:post_id>1944</wp:post_id>

		<wp:post_date_gmt>2014-10-07 14:04:28</wp:post_date_gmt>
		<wp:comment_status>open</wp:comment_status>
		<wp:ping_status>open</wp:ping_status>
		<wp:post_name>hero-2-items</wp:post_name>
		<wp:status>publish</wp:status>
		<wp:post_parent>0</wp:post_parent>
		<wp:menu_order>0</wp:menu_order>
		<wp:post_type>iapp_showcase</wp:post_type>
		<wp:post_password></wp:post_password>

	<item>
		<title>Sample Page</title>
		<link>http://www.nhkeu.co.uk/?page_id=2</link>
		<pubDate>Mon, 08 Sep 2014 12:43:23 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[kevinhsu]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://demo.leafcolor.com/applay/?page_id=2</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[This is an example page. It's different from a blog post because it will stay in one place and will show up in your site navigation (in most themes). Most people start with an About page that introduces them to potential site visitors. It might say something like this:

<blockquote>Hi there! I'm a bike messenger by day, aspiring actor by night, and this is my blog. I live in Los Angeles, have a great dog named Jack, and I like pi&#241;a coladas. (And gettin' caught in the rain.)</blockquote>

...or something like this:

<blockquote>The XYZ Doohickey Company was founded in 1971, and has been providing quality doohickeys to the public ever since. Located in Gotham City, XYZ employs over 2,000 people and does all kinds of awesome things for the Gotham community.</blockquote>

As a new WordPress user, you should go to <a href="http://demo.leafcolor.com/applay/wp-admin/">your dashboard</a> to delete this page and create new pages for your content. Have fun!]]></content:encoded>
		<excerpt:encoded><![CDATA[]]></excerpt:encoded>
		<wp:post_id>2</wp:post_id>
		<wp:post_date>2014-09-08 13:43:23</wp:post_date>
		<wp:post_date_gmt>2014-09-08 12:43:23</wp:post_date_gmt>
		<wp:comment_status>open</wp:comment_status>
		<wp:ping_status>closed</wp:ping_status>
		<wp:post_name>sample-page</wp:post_name>
		<wp:status>pending</wp:status>
		<wp:post_parent>0</wp:post_parent>
		<wp:menu_order>0</wp:menu_order>
		<wp:post_type>page</wp:post_type>
		<wp:post_password></wp:post_password>
		<wp:is_sticky>0</wp:is_sticky>
		<wp:postmeta>
			<wp:meta_key>_wp_page_template</wp:meta_key>
			<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[default]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
		<wp:postmeta>
			<wp:meta_key>_edit_last</wp:meta_key>
			<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[1]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
	</item>
	<item>
		<title>Features</title>
		<link>http://www.nhkeu.co.uk/?page_id=12</link>
		<pubDate>Sun, 25 Jul 2010 18:40:01 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[kevinhsu]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://wpthemetestdata.wordpress.com/about/</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[[vc_row][vc_column width="2/3"][vc_column_text]I am text block. Click edit button to change this text. Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Ut elit tellus, luctus nec ullamcorper mattis, pulvinar dapibus leo.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3"][vc_wp_custommenu nav_menu="175" title="Shortcodes"][/vc_column][/vc_row]]]></content:encoded>
		<excerpt:encoded><![CDATA[]]></excerpt:encoded>
		<wp:post_id>12</wp:post_id>
		<wp:post_date>2010-07-25 19:40:01</wp:post_date>
		<wp:post_date_gmt>2010-07-25 18:40:01</wp:post_date_gmt>
		<wp:comment_status>closed</wp:comment_status>
		<wp:ping_status>closed</wp:ping_status>
		<wp:post_name>features</wp:post_name>
		<wp:status>pending</wp:status>
		<wp:post_parent>0</wp:post_parent>
		<wp:menu_order>1</wp:menu_order>
		<wp:post_type>page</wp:post_type>
		<wp:post_password></wp:post_password>
		<wp:is_sticky>0</wp:is_sticky>

		<wp:post_parent>0</wp:post_parent>
		<wp:menu_order>11</wp:menu_order>

	<item>
		<title>Page Image Alignment</title>
		<link>http://www.nhkeu.co.uk/?page_id=1133</link>
		<pubDate>Fri, 15 Mar 2013 18:19:23 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[kevinhsu]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://wptest.io/demo/?page_id=1080</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[Welcome to image alignment! The best way to demonstrate the ebb and flow of the various image positioning options is to nestle them snuggly among an ocean of words. Grab a paddle and let's get started.

On the topic of alignment, it should be noted that users can choose from the options of <em>None</em>, <em>Left</em>, <em>Right, </em>and <em>Center</em>. In addition, they also get the options of <em>Thumbnail</em>, <em>Medium</em>, <em>Large</em> &amp; <em>Fullsize</em>.
<p style="text-align:center;"><img class="size-full wp-image-906 aligncenter" title="Image Alignment 580x300" alt="Image Alignment 580x300" src="http://demo.leafcolor.com/applay/wp-content/uploads/2013/03/image-alignment-580x300.jpg" width="580" height="300" /></p>
The image above happens to be <em><strong>centered</strong></em>.

<strong><img class="size-full wp-image-904 alignleft" title="Image Alignment 150x150" alt="Image Alignment 150x150" src="http://demo.leafcolor.com/applay/wp-content/uploads/2013/03/image-alignment-150x150.jpg" width="150" height="150" /></strong>The rest of this paragraph is filler for the sake of seeing the text wrap around the 150x150 image, which is <em><strong>left aligned</strong></em>. <strong></strong>

As you can see the should be some space above, below, and to the right of the image. The text should not be creeping on the image. Creeping is just not right. Images need breathing room too. Let them speak like you words. Let them do their jobs without any hassle from the text. In about one more sentence here, we'll see that the text moves from the right of the image down below the image in seamless transition. Again, letting the do it's thang. Mission accomplished!

And now for a <em><strong>massively large image</strong></em>. It also has <em><strong>no alignment</strong></em>.

<img class="alignnone  wp-image-907" title="Image Alignment 1200x400" alt="Image Alignment 1200x400" src="http://demo.leafcolor.com/applay/wp-content/uploads/2013/03/image-alignment-1200x4002.jpg" width="1200" height="400" />

The image above, though 1200px wide, should not overflow the content area. It should remain contained with no visible disruption to the flow of content.

<img class="size-full wp-image-905 alignright" title="Image Alignment 300x200" alt="Image Alignment 300x200" src="http://demo.leafcolor.com/applay/wp-content/uploads/2013/03/image-alignment-300x200.jpg" width="300" height="200" />

And now we're going to shift things to the <em><strong>right align</strong></em>. Again, there should be plenty of room above, below, and to the left of the image. Just look at him there... Hey guy! Way to rock that right side. I don't care what the left aligned image says, you look great. Don't let anyone else tell you differently.

In just a bit here, you should see the text start to wrap below the right aligned image and settle in nicely. There should still be plenty of room and everything should be sitting pretty. Yeah... Just like that. It never felt so good to be right.

And just when you thought we were done, we're going to do them all over again with captions!

[caption id="attachment_906" align="aligncenter" width="580"]<img class="size-full wp-image-906  " title="Image Alignment 580x300" alt="Image Alignment 580x300" src="http://demo.leafcolor.com/applay/wp-content/uploads/2013/03/image-alignment-580x300.jpg" width="580" height="300" /> Look at 580x300 getting some <a title="Image Settings" href="http://en.support.wordpress.com/images/image-settings/">caption</a> love.[/caption]

The image above happens to be <em><strong>centered</strong></em>. The caption also has a link in it, just to see if it does anything funky.

[caption id="attachment_904" align="alignleft" width="150"]<img class="size-full wp-image-904  " title="Image Alignment 150x150" alt="Image Alignment 150x150" src="http://demo.leafcolor.com/applay/wp-content/uploads/2013/03/image-alignment-150x150.jpg" width="150" height="150" /> Itty-bitty caption.[/caption]

<strong></strong>The rest of this paragraph is filler for the sake of seeing the text wrap around the 150x150 image, which is <em><strong>left aligned</strong></em>. <strong></strong>

As you can see the should be some space above, below, and to the right of the image. The text should not be creeping on the image. Creeping is just not right. Images need breathing room too. Let them speak like you words. Let them do their jobs without any hassle from the text. In about one more sentence here, we'll see that the text moves from the right of the image down below the image in seamless transition. Again, letting the do it's thang. Mission accomplished!

And now for a <em><strong>massively large image</strong></em>. It also has <em><strong>no alignment</strong></em>.

[caption id="attachment_907" align="alignnone" width="1200"]<img class=" wp-image-907" title="Image Alignment 1200x400" alt="Image Alignment 1200x400" src="http://demo.leafcolor.com/applay/wp-content/uploads/2013/03/image-alignment-1200x4002.jpg" width="1200" height="400" /> Massive image comment for your eyeballs.[/caption]

The image above, though 1200px wide, should not overflow the content area. It should remain contained with no visible disruption to the flow of content.

[caption id="attachment_905" align="alignright" width="300"]<img class="size-full wp-image-905 " title="Image Alignment 300x200" alt="Image Alignment 300x200" src="http://demo.leafcolor.com/applay/wp-content/uploads/2013/03/image-alignment-300x200.jpg" width="300" height="200" /> Feels good to be right all the time.[/caption]

And now we're going to shift things to the <em><strong>right align</strong></em>. Again, there should be plenty of room above, below, and to the left of the image. Just look at him there... Hey guy! Way to rock that right side. I don't care what the left aligned image says, you look great. Don't let anyone else tell you differently.

In just a bit here, you should see the text start to wrap below the right aligned image and settle in nicely. There should still be plenty of room and everything should be sitting pretty. Yeah... Just like that. It never felt so good to be right.

And that's a wrap, yo! You survived the tumultuous waters of alignment. Image alignment achievement unlocked!]]></content:encoded>

		<wp:ping_status>closed</wp:ping_status>

	</item>
	<item>
		<title>Page Markup And Formatting</title>
		<link>http://www.nhkeu.co.uk/?page_id=1134</link>
		<pubDate>Fri, 15 Mar 2013 18:20:05 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[kevinhsu]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://wptest.io/demo/?page_id=1083</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<strong>Headings</strong>
<h1>Header one</h1>
<h2>Header two</h2>
<h3>Header three</h3>
<h4>Header four</h4>
<h5>Header five</h5>
<h6>Header six</h6>
<h2>Blockquotes</h2>
Single line blockquote:
<blockquote>Stay hungry. Stay foolish.</blockquote>
Multi line blockquote with a cite reference:
<blockquote>People think focus means saying yes to the thing you've got to focus on. But that's not what it means at all. It means saying no to the hundred other good ideas that there are. You have to pick carefully. I'm actually as proud of the things we haven't done as the things I have done. Innovation is saying no to 1,000 things. <cite>Steve Jobs - Apple Worldwide Developers' Conference, 1997</cite></blockquote>
<h2>Tables</h2>
<table>
<tbody>
<tr>
<th>Employee</th>
<th class="views">Salary</th>
<th></th>
</tr>
<tr class="odd">
<td><a href="http://example.com/">Jane</a></td>
<td>$1</td>
<td>Because that's all Steve Job' needed for a salary.</td>
</tr>
<tr class="even">
<td><a href="http://example.com">John</a></td>
<td>$100K</td>
<td>For all the blogging he does.</td>
</tr>
<tr class="odd">
<td><a href="http://example.com/">Jane</a></td>
<td>$100M</td>
<td>Pictures are worth a thousand words, right? So Tom x 1,000.</td>
</tr>
<tr class="even">
<td><a href="http://example.com/">Jane</a></td>
<td>$100B</td>
<td>With hair like that?! Enough said...</td>
</tr>
</tbody>
</table>
<h2>Definition Lists</h2>
<dl><dt>Definition List Title</dt><dd>Definition list division.</dd><dt>Startup</dt><dd>A startup company or startup is a company or temporary organization designed to search for a repeatable and scalable business model.</dd><dt>#dowork</dt><dd>Coined by Rob Dyrdek and his personal body guard Christopher "Big Black" Boykins, "Do Work" works as a self motivator, to motivating your friends.</dd><dt>Do It Live</dt><dd>I'll let Bill O'Reilly will <a title="We'll Do It Live" href="https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=O_HyZ5aW76c">explain</a> this one.</dd></dl>
<h2>Unordered Lists (Nested)</h2>
<ul>
	<li>List item one
<ul>
	<li>List item one
<ul>
	<li>List item one</li>
	<li>List item two</li>
	<li>List item three</li>
	<li>List item four</li>
</ul>
</li>
	<li>List item two</li>
	<li>List item three</li>
	<li>List item four</li>
</ul>
</li>
	<li>List item two</li>
	<li>List item three</li>
	<li>List item four</li>
</ul>
<h2>Ordered List (Nested)</h2>
<ol>
	<li>List item one
<ol>
	<li>List item one
<ol>
	<li>List item one</li>
	<li>List item two</li>
	<li>List item three</li>
	<li>List item four</li>
</ol>
</li>
	<li>List item two</li>
	<li>List item three</li>
	<li>List item four</li>
</ol>
</li>
	<li>List item two</li>
	<li>List item three</li>
	<li>List item four</li>
</ol>
<h2>HTML Tags</h2>
These supported tags come from the WordPress.com code <a title="Code" href="http://en.support.wordpress.com/code/">FAQ</a>.

<strong>Address Tag</strong>

<address>1 Infinite Loop
Cupertino, CA 95014
United States</address><strong>Anchor Tag (aka. Link)</strong>

This is an example of a <a title="Apple" href="http://apple.com">link</a>.

<strong>Abbreviation Tag</strong>

The abbreviation <abbr title="Seriously">srsly</abbr> stands for "seriously".

<strong>Acronym Tag</strong>

The acronym <acronym title="For The Win">ftw</acronym> stands for "for the win".

<strong>Big Tag</strong>

These tests are a <big>big</big> deal, but this tag is no longer supported in HTML5.

<strong>Cite Tag</strong>

"Code is poetry." --<cite>Automattic</cite>

<strong>Code Tag</strong>

You will learn later on in these tests that <code>word-wrap: break-word;</code> will be your best friend.

<strong>Delete Tag</strong>

This tag will let you <del>strikeout text</del>, but this tag is no longer supported in HTML5 (use the <code>&lt;strike&gt;</code> instead).

<strong>Emphasize Tag</strong>

The emphasize tag should <em>italicize</em> text.

<strong>Insert Tag</strong>

This tag should denote <ins>inserted</ins> text.

<strong>Keyboard Tag</strong>

This scarcely known tag emulates <kbd>keyboard text</kbd>, which is usually styled like the <code>&lt;code&gt;</code> tag.

<strong>Preformatted Tag</strong>

This tag styles large blocks of code.
<pre>.post-title {
	margin: 0 0 5px;
	font-weight: bold;
	font-size: 38px;
	line-height: 1.2;
}</pre>
<strong>Quote Tag</strong>

<q>Developers, developers, developers...</q> --Steve Ballmer

<strong>Strong Tag</strong>

This tag shows <strong>bold<strong> text.</strong></strong>

<strong>Subscript Tag</strong>

Getting our science styling on with H<sub>2</sub>O, which should push the "2" down.

<strong>Superscript Tag</strong>

Still sticking with science and Isaac Newton's E = MC<sup>2</sup>, which should lift the 2 up.

<strong>Teletype Tag</strong>

This rarely used tag emulates <tt>teletype text</tt>, which is usually styled like the <code>&lt;code&gt;</code> tag.

<strong>Variable Tag</strong>

This allows you to denote <var>variables</var>.]]></content:encoded>

			<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[]]></wp:meta_value>

		<wp:post_id>1699</wp:post_id>
		<wp:post_date>2014-09-08 22:43:41</wp:post_date>
		<wp:post_date_gmt>2014-09-08 21:43:41</wp:post_date_gmt>

		<wp:ping_status>closed</wp:ping_status>
		<wp:post_name>shop</wp:post_name>

<p style="text-align: center;">Sed ut perspiciatis unde omnis iste natus error sit voluptatem accusantium doloremque laudantium, totam rem aperiam, eaque ipsa quae ab illo inventore veritatis et quasi architecto beatae vitae dicta sunt explicabo. 		<title>Tabs + Tour</title>

	<item>
		<title>Fusce id ex eu odio</title>
		<link>http://www.nhkeu.co.uk/contactus</link>
		<pubDate>Fri, 08 Jan 2010 14:59:31 +0000</pubDate>

		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[Fusce id ex eu odio rhoncus pretium. Nullam vel ligula nec dui sagittis dictum. Pellentesque blandit mauris ligula, vel scelerisque dui lobortis at. Nulla non posuere tortor. Etiam quis dapibus sem. Suspendisse dignissim quam in mauris molestie sodales. Fusce mauris eros, vehicula sed urna sed, mollis pretium nulla. Integer tempor arcu mi, eget congue leo sagittis nec. In sed lorem dapibus, mollis urna nec, imperdiet nunc. Nulla facilisi. Sed malesuada gravida consequat. Donec facilisis ligula magna.

Vivamus sodales faucibus porttitor. Fusce consectetur sem nec euismod varius.]]></content:encoded>

	<item>
		<title>Suspendisse potenti</title>
		<link>http://www.nhkeu.co.uk/contactus</link>
		<pubDate>Mon, 05 Oct 2009 19:00:59 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[kevinhsu]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://wptest.io/demo/?p=877</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[Suspendisse potenti. Quisque rhoncus sit amet orci id maximus. Fusce cursus dictum tellus non pulvinar.

Fusce sodales, arcu vel mattis volutpat, sem odio tincidunt velit, eu mattis velit mi eu est. Proin viverra ultricies pretium. Fusce ac tempor justo. Duis ornare luctus sapien et blandit. Fusce id ex eu odio rhoncus pretium. Nullam vel ligula nec dui sagittis dictum. Pellentesque blandit mauris ligula, vel scelerisque dui lobortis at. Nulla non posuere tortor. Etiam quis dapibus sem. Suspendisse dignissim quam in mauris molestie sodales. Fusce mauris eros, vehicula sed urna sed, mollis pretium nulla. Integer tempor arcu mi, eget congue leo sagittis nec. In sed lorem dapibus, mollis urna nec, imperdiet nunc. Nulla facilisi. Sed malesuada gravida consequat. Donec facilisis ligula magna.]]></content:encoded>
		<excerpt:encoded><![CDATA[]]></excerpt:encoded>
		<wp:post_id>1175</wp:post_id>
		<wp:post_date>2009-10-05 12:00:59</wp:post_date>
		<wp:post_date_gmt>2009-10-05 19:00:59</wp:post_date_gmt>
		<wp:comment_status>closed</wp:comment_status>
		<wp:ping_status>closed</wp:ping_status>
		<wp:post_name>suspendisse-potenti</wp:post_name>
		<wp:status>trash</wp:status>
		<wp:post_parent>0</wp:post_parent>
		<wp:menu_order>0</wp:menu_order>
		<wp:post_type>post</wp:post_type>
		<wp:post_password></wp:post_password>

	<item>
		<title>Homepage</title>
		<link>http://www.nhkeu.co.uk/</link>
		<pubDate>Wed, 19 Nov 2014 21:10:32 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[kevinhsu]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://www.nhkeu.co.uk/?page_id=2586</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[[vc_row css=".vc_custom_1416673520596{margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 100px !important;padding-bottom: 50px !important;background-image: url(http://www.nhkeu.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2014/11/background_image_PS1.jpg?id=2929) !important;background-position: 0 0 !important;background-repeat: repeat !important;}" ia_row_style="0" ia_row_paralax="1" ia_row_scheme="1" font_color="FFFFFF"][vc_column width="1/1"][vc_empty_space height="62px"][ia_heading size="1" align="center"]NHK rewards you for buying your favourite brands[/ia_heading][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1427159225807{margin-bottom: 60px !important;}"]
<p class="p1" style="text-align: center;"><span class="s1">NHK provides members exclusive access to rewards from all their favourite brands wherever they shop. </span></p>
<p class="p1" style="text-align: center;"><span class="s1">Buy products, snap the receipt and receive cash securely into your bank or PayPal account - it's easy!</span></p>
<p style="text-align: center;">[ia_button id="button_9" size="big" solid="0" link="https://itunes.apple.com/app/na-hui-kou-ou-zhou-she-chi/id962758181?l=en&amp;mt=8" icon="fa-apple" arrow="0" color="#" css_animation="" animation_delay=""]AppStore[/ia_button]  [ia_button id="button_8" size="big" solid="1" link="https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.glenmere.nhk.customer" icon="fa-google" arrow="0" color="#" css_animation="" animation_delay=""]Google Play[/ia_button]</p>
[/vc_column_text][ias_showcase showcase="1816"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=".vc_custom_1412701079492{padding-top: 40px !important;padding-bottom: 20px !important;}" ia_row_style="0" ia_row_paralax="0" ia_row_scheme="0"][vc_column width="1/2"][ia_heading size="0" align="left"]Connect with us[/ia_heading][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/6"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/6"][vc_single_image image="2688" alignment="center" border_color="grey" img_link_target="_self"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/6"][vc_single_image image="2692" alignment="center" border_color="grey" img_link_target="_self"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/6"][vc_single_image image="2907" border_color="grey" img_link_target="_self" alignment="center"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/6"][vc_single_image image="2689" alignment="center" border_color="grey" img_link_target="_self"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/6"][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/6"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/6"][vc_single_image image="2694" border_color="grey" img_link_target="_self" alignment="center"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/6"][vc_single_image image="2693" alignment="center" border_color="grey" img_link_target="_self"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/6"][vc_single_image image="2691" alignment="center" border_color="grey" img_link_target="_self"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/6"][vc_single_image image="2690" alignment="center" border_color="grey" img_link_target="_self"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/6"][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/6"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="2/3"][vc_column_text]
<p style="text-align: center;">[mc4wp_form]</p>
[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/6"][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2"][ia_heading size="0" align="left"]About Us[/ia_heading][vc_accordion][vc_accordion_tab title="NHK and Glenmere Technology Ltd."][vc_column_text]NHK is a mobile app developed by Glenmere Technology Ltd. The app takes the commission (termed "cashback") usually paid by retailers to third-party referrers and passes it on to NHK members.

Glenmere Technology Ltd is a London-based startup founded in 2014. NHK app is available to download from Apple Store and Google Play.

[ia_button id="button_57" size="small" solid="0" link="http://www.nhkeu.co.uk/contact-us" icon="fa-rocket" arrow="1" color="#" css_animation="" animation_delay=""]Learn More[/ia_button][/vc_column_text][/vc_accordion_tab][/vc_accordion][/vc_column][/vc_row]]]></content:encoded>
		<excerpt:encoded><![CDATA[]]></excerpt:encoded>
		<wp:post_id>2586</wp:post_id>
		<wp:post_date>2014-11-19 21:10:32</wp:post_date>
		<wp:post_date_gmt>2014-11-19 21:10:32</wp:post_date_gmt>
		<wp:comment_status>closed</wp:comment_status>
		<wp:ping_status>closed</wp:ping_status>
		<wp:post_name>homepage</wp:post_name>
		<wp:status>publish</wp:status>

	<item>
		<title>Help Retailers</title>
		<link>http://www.nhkeu.co.uk/how-we-help-retailers</link>
		<pubDate>Sat, 29 Nov 2014 16:16:31 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[kevinhsu]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://www.nhkeu.co.uk/?page_id=2947</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[[vc_row css=".vc_custom_1417282466930{background-color: #ffffff !important;}" ia_row_style="0" ia_row_paralax="0" ia_row_scheme="0"][vc_column width="1/1"][vc_empty_space height="152px"][vc_row_inner css=".vc_custom_1417282934995{margin-bottom: -102px !important;}"][vc_column_inner width="1/2" css=".vc_custom_1417283949237{padding-top: 32px !important;}"][ia_heading size="1" align="center"]NHK retailer portal[/ia_heading][vc_column_text]
<p style="text-align: center;">NHK is a game-changing app that enables luxury brands to connect directly with NHK members before, during and after their shopping experience via 6 unique steps:</p>
<p style="text-align: center;"><strong>SCAN – CHECK – CONFIRM – TRACK – SUMMARIZE – ANALYSE</strong></p>
[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]
<p style="text-align: center;">[ia_button id="button_8" size="big" solid="0" link="http://www.nhkeu.co.uk/partnership-enquiries" icon="fa-question-circle" arrow="0" color="#" css_animation="" animation_delay=""]Partnership Enquiries[/ia_button] [ia_button id="button_8" size="big" solid="0" link="http://www.nhkeu.co.uk/partnership-enquiries" icon="fa-sign-in" arrow="0" color="#" css_animation="" animation_delay=""]Log In[/ia_button]</p>
[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2" css=".vc_custom_1417282667642{padding-bottom: -50px !important;}"][ias_showcase showcase="1861"][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row ia_row_style="0" ia_row_paralax="0" ia_row_scheme="0"][vc_column width="1/3" css=".vc_custom_1417281749549{padding-bottom: 20px !important;}"][ia_iconbox icon="fa-qrcode" heading="Scan" layout="left"]<strong>SCAN</strong> a customer’s QR code[/ia_iconbox][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3" css=".vc_custom_1417281771977{padding-bottom: 20px !important;}"][ia_iconbox icon="fa-check-square-o " heading="Check" layout="left"]<strong>CHECK</strong> if the receipt uploaded by the a customer is genuine[/ia_iconbox][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3" css=".vc_custom_1417281778627{padding-bottom: 20px !important;}"][ia_iconbox icon="fa-gavel" heading="Confirm" layout="left"]<strong>CONFIRM</strong> a cash back request[/ia_iconbox][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row ia_row_style="0" ia_row_paralax="0" ia_row_scheme="0"][vc_column width="1/3" css=".vc_custom_1417281870911{padding-bottom: 20px !important;}"][ia_iconbox icon="fa-eye" heading="Track" layout="left"]<strong>TRACK</strong> the cash backs progress[/ia_iconbox][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3" css=".vc_custom_1417281878474{padding-bottom: 20px !important;}"][ia_iconbox icon="fa-usd " heading="Summarize" layout="left"]<strong>SUMMARIZE</strong> the cash back amount[/ia_iconbox][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3" css=".vc_custom_1417281900390{padding-bottom: 20px !important;}"][ia_iconbox icon="fa-bar-chart " heading="Analyze" layout="left"]<strong>ANALYZE</strong> consumers behaviour[/ia_iconbox][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=".vc_custom_1421882639281{padding-top: 40px !important;padding-bottom: 40px !important;background-color: #fcfcfc !important;}" ia_row_style="0" ia_row_paralax="0" ia_row_scheme="0"][vc_column width="1/1" css=".vc_custom_1421882860349{margin-bottom: 40px !important;}"][ia_heading size="0" align="left"]Retailer Portal[/ia_heading][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][vc_column_text]
<p style="text-align: center;">[ia_button id="button_9" size="big" solid="0" link="itms-services://?action=download-manifest&amp;url=https://s3-eu-west-1.amazonaws.com/nhkapps/iosapp/NHKshop.plist" icon="fa-apple" arrow="0" color="#" css_animation="" animation_delay=""]       Retailer IOS        [/ia_button]</p>
[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][vc_column_text]
<p style="text-align: center;">[ia_button id="button_8" size="big" solid="1" link="http://www.nhkeu.co.uk/download/retailer.apk" icon="fa-android" arrow="0" color="#" css_animation="" animation_delay=""]   Retailer Android     [/ia_button]</p>
[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=".vc_custom_1417282482941{padding-bottom: 20px !important;}" ia_row_style="0" ia_row_paralax="0" ia_row_scheme="0"][vc_column width="1/2"][ia_heading size="0" align="left"]Connect with us[/ia_heading][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/6"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/6"][vc_single_image image="2688" alignment="center" border_color="grey" img_link_target="_self"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/6"][vc_single_image image="2692" alignment="center" border_color="grey" img_link_target="_self"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/6"][vc_single_image image="2907" border_color="grey" img_link_target="_self" alignment="center"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/6"][vc_single_image image="2689" alignment="center" border_color="grey" img_link_target="_self"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/6"][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/6"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/6"][vc_single_image image="2694" border_color="grey" img_link_target="_self" alignment="center"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/6"][vc_single_image image="2693" alignment="center" border_color="grey" img_link_target="_self"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/6"][vc_single_image image="2691" alignment="center" border_color="grey" img_link_target="_self"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/6"][vc_single_image image="2690" alignment="center" border_color="grey" img_link_target="_self"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/6"][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/6"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="2/3"][vc_column_text][mc4wp_form][/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/6"][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2"][ia_heading size="0" align="left"]What Can We Do for NHK Retailers[/ia_heading][vc_accordion][vc_accordion_tab title="MORE EFFECTIVE MARKETING INVESTMENT"][vc_column_text]Your marketing investment is more effective because the rewards are delivered directly to the shopper, driving the behaviour and developing the personal relationship you want to create with your consumers.[/vc_column_text][/vc_accordion_tab][vc_accordion_tab title="SECTOR EXPERTISE"][vc_column_text]Our team members are all Luxury Industry marketing, sales and category experts. We understand how to create a customised programme of activity that helps luxury brands connect directly with their consumers and building long-term brand loyalty in a 21st century way.[/vc_column_text][/vc_accordion_tab][vc_accordion_tab title="NO MORE PAPER COUPONS"][vc_column_text]With our digital solution, there is none of the hassle and slowness of paper coupons. Smart millennial shoppers don’t want to print out pieces of paper at home; instead they expect their interactions to be personalised, fast and digital. That's NHK![/vc_column_text][/vc_accordion_tab][/vc_accordion][/vc_column][/vc_row]]]></content:encoded>

	<item>
		<title>Reward Members</title>
		<link>http://www.nhkeu.co.uk/how-we-reward-customers</link>
		<pubDate>Sat, 29 Nov 2014 16:18:00 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[kevinhsu]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://www.nhkeu.co.uk/?page_id=2951</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[[vc_row css=".vc_custom_1417280292623{margin-bottom: -10px !important;padding-bottom: 50px !important;background-image: url(http://www.nhkeu.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2014/11/oxford-street-shopping-spree-pic-getty-images-54290565_PS1.jpg?id=2918) !important;background-position: 0 0 !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;}" ia_row_style="0" ia_row_paralax="1" ia_row_scheme="1"][vc_column width="1/1"][vc_empty_space height="152px"][ia_heading size="1" align="center"]NHK member portal[/ia_heading][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1423137043001{margin-bottom: 60px !important;}"]
<p style="text-align: center;">NHK provides you exclusive access to rewards from all your favourite brands wherever you shop.</p>
<p style="text-align: center;"><strong>SHOP</strong> around using NHK app; get <strong>NAVIGATED</strong> to the retailer by the app;</p>
<p style="text-align: center;">get your QR code <strong>SCANNED</strong>; <strong>SNAP</strong> and <strong>UPLOAD</strong> the receipt,</p>
<p style="text-align: center;"><strong>T</strong><strong>RACK</strong> your footprint and receive <strong>CASHBACK</strong> securely into your bank or PayPal account - it's easy!</p>
[/vc_column_text][ias_showcase showcase="2105"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=".vc_custom_1412701079492{padding-top: 40px !important;padding-bottom: 20px !important;}" ia_row_style="0" ia_row_paralax="0" ia_row_scheme="0"][vc_column width="1/2"][ia_heading size="0" align="left"]Connect with us[/ia_heading][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/6"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/6"][vc_single_image image="2688" alignment="center" border_color="grey" img_link_target="_self"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/6"][vc_single_image image="2692" alignment="center" border_color="grey" img_link_target="_self"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/6"][vc_single_image image="2907" border_color="grey" img_link_target="_self" alignment="center"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/6"][vc_single_image image="2689" alignment="center" border_color="grey" img_link_target="_self"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/6"][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/6"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/6"][vc_single_image image="2694" border_color="grey" img_link_target="_self" alignment="center"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/6"][vc_single_image image="2693" alignment="center" border_color="grey" img_link_target="_self"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/6"][vc_single_image image="2691" alignment="center" border_color="grey" img_link_target="_self"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/6"][vc_single_image image="2690" alignment="center" border_color="grey" img_link_target="_self"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/6"][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/6"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="2/3"][vc_column_text][mc4wp_form][/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/6"][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2"][ia_heading size="0" align="left"]WHAT CAN WE DO FOR NHK MEMBERS[/ia_heading][vc_accordion][vc_accordion_tab title="BRING YOU TO THE RETAILER’S DOORSTEP"][vc_column_text]The unique “Cashback Radar” feature will enable you to find the nearest retailer with cashback rewards and NHK will navigate you to the retailer’s doorstep.[/vc_column_text][/vc_accordion_tab][vc_accordion_tab title="YOU CAN TRACK THE WHOLE CASHBACK PROGRESS"][vc_column_text]Every step of the Cashback experience can be tracked clearly through the “My Footprint” feature, so you know exactly when you will be rewarded.[/vc_column_text][/vc_accordion_tab][vc_accordion_tab title="REWARDS ARE BETTER THAN ANYTHING"][vc_column_text]NHK app takes the commission (termed "cashback") usually paid by retailers to third-party referrers and passes it on to NHK members. You can even choose your own currency![/vc_column_text][/vc_accordion_tab][/vc_accordion][/vc_column][/vc_row]]]></content:encoded>

	<item>
		<title>Cookie Policy</title>
		<link>http://www.nhkeu.co.uk/cookie-policy</link>
		<pubDate>Tue, 10 Feb 2015 23:03:19 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[kevinhsu]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://www.nhkeu.co.uk/?page_id=3170</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[[vc_row][vc_column width="1/1"][vc_column_text]NHK uses cookies to deliver superior functionality and to enhance your experience of our websites. Continued use of this site indicates that you accept this policy.

Cookies are small text files stored on your computer by your browser. They're used for many things, such as remembering whether you've visited the site before, so that you remain logged in - or to help us work out how many new website visitors we get each month. They contain information about the use of your computer but don't include personal information about you (they don't store your name, for instance).

This policy explains how cookies are used on NHK websites in general - and, below, how you can control the cookies that may be used on this site (not all of them are used on every site).

<strong>About this Cookie policy </strong>

This Cookie Policy applies to all of our websites and our mobile applications ("the Website"). In this Cookie Policy, when we refer to any of our Websites, we mean any website or mobile application operated by or on behalf of Glenmere Technology Ltd or its subsidiaries and affiliates, regardless of how you access the network. By accessing the Website, you agree that this Cookie Policy will apply whenever you access the Website on any device. Any changes to this policy will be posted here. We reserve the right to vary this Cookie Policy from time to time and such changes shall become effective as soon as they are posted. Your continued use of the Website constitutes your agreement to all such changes.

<strong>Our use of cookies </strong>

We may collect information automatically when you visit the Website, using cookies. The cookies allow us to identify your computer and find out details about your last visit. You can choose, below, not to allow cookies. If you do, we can't guarantee that your experience with the Website will be as good as if you do allow cookies. The information collected by cookies does not personally identify you; it includes general information about your computer settings, your connection to the Internet e.g. operating system and platform, IP address, your browsing patterns and timings of browsing on the Website and your location. Most internet browsers accept cookies automatically, but you can change the settings of your browser to erase cookies or prevent automatic acceptance if you prefer.

<strong>Types of cookie that may be used during your visit to the Website: </strong>

The following types of cookie are used on this site. We don't list every single cookie used by name - but for each type of cookie we tell you how you can control its use.

<strong>1. Personalisation cookies </strong>

These cookies are used to recognise repeat visitors to the Website and in conjunction with other information we hold to attempt to record specific browsing information (that is, about the way you arrive at the Website, pages you view, options you select, information you enter and the path you take through the Website). These are used to recommend content we think you'll be interested in based on what you're looked at before.

<strong>2. Analytics cookies </strong>

These monitor how visitors move around the Website and how they reached it. This is used so that we can see total (not individual) figures on which types of content users enjoy most.

<strong>3. Third-party service cookies </strong>

Social sharing, video and other services we offer are run by other companies. These companies may drop cookies on your computer when you use them on our site or if you are already logged in to them.

<strong>4. Site management cookies </strong>

These are used to maintain your identity or session on the Website. For instance, where our websites run on more than one server, we use a cookie to ensure that you are sent information by one specific server (otherwise you may log in or out unexpectedly). We may use similar cookies when you vote in opinion polls to ensure that you can only vote once, and to ensure that you can use our commenting functionality when not logged in (to ensure you don't see comments you've reported as abusive, for instance, or don't vote comments up/down more than once).

These cookies cannot be turned off individually but you could change your browser setting to refuse all cookies (see above) if you do not wish to accept them.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]]]></content:encoded>
		<excerpt:encoded><![CDATA[]]></excerpt:encoded>
		<wp:post_id>3170</wp:post_id>

		<wp:comment_status>open</wp:comment_status>
		<wp:ping_status>open</wp:ping_status>
		<wp:post_name>cookie-policy</wp:post_name>
		<wp:status>publish</wp:status>
		<wp:post_parent>0</wp:post_parent>
		<wp:menu_order>0</wp:menu_order>

		</wp:postmeta>

		</wp:postmeta>

			<wp:meta_key>_wpb_vc_js_status</wp:meta_key>

	</item>
	<item>
		<title>致全英国华人消费者公告</title>
		<link>http://www.nhkeu.co.uk/news-id001</link>
		<pubDate>Sun, 15 Mar 2015 14:01:24 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[kevinhsu]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://www.nhkeu.co.uk/?page_id=3235</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<br></br>
各位在英华人消费者/网民：

2015年3月14号晚，在微信朋友圈中发生了针对“拿回扣”购物APP的恶意谣言事件，严重损害了英国华人消费者的正当权益。为维护广大在英华人消费者权益和网民的知情权，针对此事件本公司现发表以下正式声明：

Glenmere Technology Ltd是一家注册在英国的移动互联网公司，旗下的“<strong>拿回扣”购物APP是一款专注于英国华人奢侈品线下购物返利的手机软件</strong>，于2015年2月28号正式上线。<strong>软件旨在为在英工作，学习，生活的华人朋友提供更多高端购物的返利优惠。</strong>软件上线两周内，得到了广大消费者的热烈欢迎，软件的注册量和使用量节节攀升。

在2015年3月14号晚，微信朋友圈中开始出现针对<strong>“拿回扣”APP的恶意诽谤，谣言散布者恶意中伤软件</strong>，发布诸如“有不法之徒在网上发布的拿回扣APP带有病毒，不要打开，立刻删除”等文字，还谎称“新闻中已经播放该消息”等虚假信息，鼓动不知情的网民进行转发，此事件对于本公司，软件用户以及广大在英华人消费者造成了极其恶劣的传播影响。

据调查，<strong>该事件系某些个人和小团体担心“拿回扣”ＡＰＰ向广大消费者提供返利优惠后，影响了这部分人的既得利益，而动用非法手段</strong>，捏造虚假信息利用微信平台进行传播。本公司法务部门将动用法律手段向谣言始作俑者发送律师信，追究其法律责任，维护软件用户的合法权益。

<strong>在此，敬告各位网民，在不知情的情况下，不要轻易转发传播此类谣言，以免由于传播范围的扩大导致巨大的社会危害，导致您个人被追究连带的法律责任。</strong>

就谣言中所涉及的软件的一些列安全性问题，本公司作出以下回复：

１.　关于软件安全问题，本公司的“拿回扣”APP经过一年的开发，投资超过上百万人民币，是经过苹果商店和Google Play审核认证，并在其网上商店发布供网民免费下载的返利软件。<strong>所有经过苹果公司和谷歌公司审核并发布的软件在安全性上都不存在任何问题</strong>，否则苹果公司或谷歌公司也将要承担相关法律责任。请各位消费者放心下载和使用。

２.　关于信息安全问题，由于软件的功能中涉及消费后返利的功能，的确需要消费者提供个人账户信息，但本公司有着一套完善的个人信息保护系统，保证用户的信息安全，不会泄露给第三方。<strong>本</strong><strong>公司是英国信息管理局ICO的注册单位，拥有该监管部门发放的Data Protection注册牌照，注册号：No.ZA104520，</strong>可以通过ICO官网进行查询：<a href="www.ico.org.uk">www.ico.org.uk</a>

3. 关于支付安全问题，消费者通过软件进入商店后，直接向商家进行购物支付。本软件只提供返利信息和返利记录，<strong>并不参与支付过程，根本不涉及任何银行卡交易</strong>，自然不存在任何支付安全的问题！

特别提醒各位网民，<strong>不法分子无处不在</strong>，在网上要做好相关的信息辨识工作，以免在无意识的情况下，被不法分子利用，而承担相应法律责任！

<strong>在此要感谢广大消费者和网民对于“拿回扣”APP和本公司一如既往的支持和信赖，我们将会为大家提供更好的服务以及更多的优惠购物体验。</strong>

Glenmere Technology Ltd

2015年3月15号

<br></br>]]></content:encoded>

Vivamus sodales faucibus porttitor. Fusce consectetur sem nec euismod varius. Vivamus tempus nulla at risus dignissim consequat. Nunc vel mollis lacus, at luctus ipsum. 		<title>Nulla non posuere tortor</title>

		<content:encoded><![CDATA[Proin viverra ultricies pretium. Fusce ac tempor justo. Duis ornare luctus sapien et blandit. Fusce id ex eu odio rhoncus pretium. Nullam vel ligula nec dui sagittis dictum. Pellentesque blandit mauris ligula, vel scelerisque dui lobortis at. Nulla non posuere tortor. Etiam quis dapibus sem. Suspendisse dignissim quam in mauris molestie sodales. Fusce mauris eros, vehicula sed urna sed, mollis pretium nulla. Integer tempor arcu mi, eget congue leo sagittis nec. In sed lorem dapibus, mollis urna nec, imperdiet nunc. Nulla facilisi. Sed malesuada gravida consequat. Donec facilisis ligula magna.

Vivamus sodales faucibus porttitor. Fusce consectetur sem nec euismod varius. Vivamus tempus nulla at risus dignissim consequat. Nunc vel mollis lacus, at luctus ipsum. Maecenas finibus sollicitudin quam, vel varius ipsum pulvinar eget. Aliquam ac sem consectetur, condimentum augue vitae, vestibulum neque. In convallis est ligula, non sollicitudin ante vulputate sit amet. Vestibulum tellus lectus, viverra non diam at, faucibus blandit eros. Aliquam sed efficitur nulla.]]></content:encoded>

			<wp:comment_date_gmt>2012-09-03 17:18:04</wp:comment_date_gmt>
			<wp:comment_content><![CDATA[<h2>Headings</h2>
<h1>Header one</h1>
<h2>Header two</h2>
<h3>Header three</h3>
<h4>Header four</h4>
<h5>Header five</h5>
<h6>Header six</h6>
<h2>Blockquotes</h2>
Single line blockquote:
<blockquote>Stay hungry. Stay foolish.</blockquote>
Multi line blockquote with a cite reference:
<blockquote>People think focus means saying yes to the thing you've got to focus on. But that's not what it means at all. It means saying no to the hundred other good ideas that there are. You have to pick carefully. I'm actually as proud of the things we haven't done as the things I have done. Innovation is saying no to 1,000 things. <cite>Steve Jobs - Apple Worldwide Developers' Conference, 1997</cite></blockquote>

<tbody>
<tr>

</tr>
<tr class="odd">

<td>Because that's all Steve Job' needed for a salary.</td>
</tr>
<tr class="even">
<td><a href="http://example.org/" rel="nofollow">Tom McFarlin</a></td>
<td>$100K</td>
<td>For all the blogging he does.</td>
</tr>
<tr class="odd">
<td><a href="http://example.org/" rel="nofollow">Jared Erickson</a></td>
<td>$100M</td>
<td>Pictures are worth a thousand words, right? So Tom x 1,000.</td>
</tr>
<tr class="even">
<td><a href="http://example.org/" rel="nofollow">Chris Ames</a></td>
<td>$100B</td>
<td>With hair like that?! Enough said...</td>
</tr>
</tbody>
</table>
<h2>Definition Lists</h2>
<dl><dt>Definition List Title</dt><dd>Definition list division.</dd><dt>Startup</dt><dd>A startup company or startup is a company or temporary organization designed to search for a repeatable and scalable business model.</dd><dt>#dowork</dt><dd>Coined by Rob Dyrdek and his personal body guard Christopher "Big Black" Boykins, "Do Work" works as a self motivator, to motivating your friends.</dd><dt>Do It Live</dt><dd>I'll let Bill O'Reilly will <a title="We'll Do It Live" href="https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=O_HyZ5aW76c" rel="nofollow">explain</a> this one.</dd></dl>
<h2>Unordered Lists (Nested)</h2>
<ul>
	<li>List item one
<ul>
	<li>List item one
<ul>
	<li>List item one</li>
	<li>List item two</li>
	<li>List item three</li>
	<li>List item four</li>
</ul>
</li>
	<li>List item two</li>
	<li>List item three</li>
	<li>List item four</li>
</ul>
</li>
	<li>List item two</li>
	<li>List item three</li>
	<li>List item four</li>
</ul>
<h2>Ordered List (Nested)</h2>
<ol>
	<li>List item one
<ol>
	<li>List item one
<ol>
	<li>List item one</li>
	<li>List item two</li>
	<li>List item three</li>
	<li>List item four</li>
</ol>
</li>
	<li>List item two</li>
	<li>List item three</li>
	<li>List item four</li>
</ol>
</li>
	<li>List item two</li>
	<li>List item three</li>
	<li>List item four</li>
</ol>
<h2>HTML Tags</h2>
These supported tags come from the WordPress.com code <a title="Code" href="http://en.support.wordpress.com/code/" rel="nofollow">FAQ</a>.

<strong>Address Tag</strong>

<address>1 Infinite Loop
Cupertino, CA 95014
United States</address><strong>Anchor Tag (aka. Link)</strong>

This is an example of a <a title="Apple" href="http://apple.com" rel="nofollow">link</a>.

<strong>Abbreviation Tag</strong>

The abbreviation <abbr title="Seriously">srsly</abbr> stands for "seriously".

<strong>Acronym Tag</strong>

The acronym <acronym title="For The Win">ftw</acronym> stands for "for the win".

<strong>Big Tag</strong>

These tests are a <big>big</big> deal, but this tag is no longer supported in HTML5.

<strong>Cite Tag</strong>

"Code is poetry." --<cite>Automattic</cite>

<strong>Code Tag</strong>

You will learn later on in these tests that <code>word-wrap: break-word;</code> will be your best friend.

<strong>Delete Tag</strong>

This tag will let you <del>strikeout text</del>, but this tag is no longer supported in HTML5 (use the <code>&lt;strike&gt;</code> instead).

<strong>Emphasize Tag</strong>

The emphasize tag should <em>italicize</em> text.

<strong>Insert Tag</strong>

This tag should denote <ins>inserted</ins> text.

<strong>Keyboard Tag</strong>

This scarcely known tag emulates <kbd>keyboard text</kbd>, which is usually styled like the <code>&lt;code&gt;</code> tag.

<strong>Preformatted Tag</strong>

This tag styles large blocks of code.
<pre>.post-title {
  margin: 0 0 5px;
  font-weight: bold;
  font-size: 38px;
  line-height: 1.2;
}</pre>

<strong>Quote Tag</strong>

<q>Developers, developers, developers...</q> --Steve Ballmer

<strong>Strong Tag</strong>

This tag shows <strong>bold<strong> text.</strong></strong>

<strong>Subscript Tag</strong>

Getting our science styling on with H<sub>2</sub>O, which should push the "2" down.

<strong>Superscript Tag</strong>

Still sticking with science and Isaac Newton's E = MC<sup>2</sup>, which should lift the 2 up.

<strong>Teletype Tag</strong>

This rarely used tag emulates <tt>teletype text</tt>, which is usually styled like the <code>&lt;code&gt;</code> tag.

<strong>Variable Tag</strong>

This allows you to denote <var>variables</var>.]]></wp:comment_content>

	<item>
		<title>Duis ex libero</title>
		<link>http://www.nhkeu.co.uk/contactus</link>
		<pubDate>Sun, 01 Jan 2012 17:17:18 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[kevinhsu]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://wpthemetestdata.wordpress.com/2007/09/04/many-trackbacks/</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[Duis ex libero, ornare sed eros quis, facilisis bibendum ligula. Nullam nec velit risus. Donec id ligula sit amet libero convallis tristique.

Suspendisse rutrum tincidunt est, a tristique sem. Maecenas enim sapien, varius sit amet erat id, tincidunt sollicitudin erat. Nullam nec nunc felis. Praesent maximus urna sit amet mauris accumsan, sed porta ipsum finibus. Morbi quis dolor porttitor, facilisis dui quis, vehicula lacus. Donec id elit in diam tempus laoreet. Vivamus eu tincidunt felis, sit amet pulvinar dui.]]></content:encoded>

	<item>
		<title>Etiam metus mauris</title>
		<link>http://www.nhkeu.co.uk/contactus</link>
		<pubDate>Sun, 08 Jan 2012 17:00:20 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[kevinhsu]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://noeltest.wordpress.com/?p=188</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[Etiam metus mauris, viverra scelerisque sollicitudin eu, accumsan nec dolor. Fusce commodo hendrerit turpis quis commodo. Duis ex libero, ornare sed eros quis, facilisis bibendum ligula. Nullam nec velit risus. Donec id ligula sit amet libero convallis tristique.

Suspendisse rutrum tincidunt est, a tristique sem. Maecenas enim sapien, varius sit amet erat id, tincidunt sollicitudin erat. Nullam nec nunc felis. Praesent maximus urna sit amet mauris accumsan, sed porta ipsum finibus. Morbi quis dolor porttitor, facilisis dui quis, vehicula lacus. Donec id elit in diam tempus laoreet. Vivamus eu tincidunt felis, sit amet pulvinar dui.

Nam elementum iaculis nisl, vel molestie purus laoreet sed. Pellentesque ac varius nisl. Fusce dignissim viverra eros, eu convallis risus congue eu. Nunc congue ornare scelerisque. Aenean accumsan nunc et felis facilisis, eget bibendum neque tincidunt. Suspendisse potenti. Quisque rhoncus sit amet orci id maximus. Fusce cursus dictum tellus non pulvinar.]]></content:encoded>

		<content:encoded><![CDATA[Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Phasellus convallis sem nunc, id auctor nibh consectetur ac. Mauris leo magna, tincidunt quis congue sit amet, suscipit sit amet nibh. Etiam metus mauris, viverra scelerisque sollicitudin eu, accumsan nec dolor. Fusce commodo hendrerit turpis quis commodo. Duis ex libero, ornare sed eros quis, facilisis bibendum ligula. Nullam nec velit risus. Donec id ligula sit amet libero convallis tristique.

Vivamus sodales faucibus porttitor. Fusce consectetur sem nec euismod varius. Vivamus tempus nulla at risus dignissim consequat. Nunc vel mollis lacus, at luctus ipsum. Maecenas finibus sollicitudin quam, vel varius ipsum pulvinar eget. Aliquam ac sem consectetur, condimentum augue vitae, vestibulum neque. In convallis est ligula, non sollicitudin ante vulputate sit amet. Vestibulum tellus lectus, viverra non diam at, faucibus blandit eros. Aliquam sed efficitur nulla.]]></content:encoded>

	<item>
		<title>There are many variations of passages of Lorem Ipsum</title>
		<link>http://www.nhkeu.co.uk/contactus</link>
		<pubDate>Mon, 06 Oct 2014 04:36:09 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[kevinhsu]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://demo.leafcolor.com/applay/?p=1883</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[It is a long established fact that a reader will be distracted by the readable content of a page when looking at its layout. The point of using Lorem Ipsum is that it has a more-or-less normal distribution of letters, as opposed to using 'Content here, content here', making it look like readable English. Many desktop publishing packages and web page editors now use Lorem Ipsum as their default model text, and a search for 'lorem ipsum' will uncover many web sites still in their infancy. Various versions have evolved over the years, sometimes by accident, sometimes on purpose (injected humour and the like).]]></content:encoded>
		<excerpt:encoded><![CDATA[]]></excerpt:encoded>

	<item>
		<title>The best app for android</title>
		<link>http://www.nhkeu.co.uk/contactus</link>
		<pubDate>Tue, 07 Oct 2014 09:55:24 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[kevinhsu]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://demo.leafcolor.com/applay/?p=1885</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[Nam commodo suscipit quam. Suspendisse enim turpis, dictum sed, iaculis a, condimentum nec, nisi. Suspendisse eu ligula. Pellentesque posuere. Integer ante arcu, accumsan a, consectetuer eget, posuere ut, mauris.

Nunc nec neque. Morbi mattis ullamcorper velit. Praesent venenatis metus at tortor pulvinar varius. Cras ultricies mi eu turpis hendrerit fringilla. Vivamus euismod mauris.

Nunc egestas, augue at pellentesque laoreet, felis eros vehicula leo, at malesuada velit leo quis pede. Sed fringilla mauris sit amet nibh. Maecenas egestas arcu quis ligula mattis placerat. Ut varius tincidunt libero. Etiam feugiat lorem non metus.]]></content:encoded>

	<item>
		<title>Android Apps on Applay</title>
		<link>http://www.nhkeu.co.uk/contactus</link>
		<pubDate>Thu, 09 Oct 2014 02:48:43 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[kevinhsu]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://demo.leafcolor.com/applay/?p=2225</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[Etiam metus mauris, viverra scelerisque sollicitudin eu, accumsan nec dolor. Fusce commodo hendrerit turpis quis commodo. Duis ex libero, ornare sed eros quis, facilisis bibendum ligula. Nullam nec velit risus. Donec id ligula sit amet libero convallis tristique.

Suspendisse rutrum tincidunt est, a tristique sem. Maecenas enim sapien, varius sit amet erat id, tincidunt sollicitudin erat. Nullam nec nunc felis. Quisque id odio. Pellentesque libero tortor, tincidunt et, tincidunt eget, semper nec, quam. Pellentesque egestas, neque sit amet convallis pulvinar, justo nulla eleifend augue, ac auctor orci leo non est. Etiam ut purus mattis mauris sodales aliquam. 	<item>
		<title>致全英国华人消费者公告 务必阅读！转发告知周围朋友！</title>
		<link>http://www.nhkeu.co.uk/contactus</link>
		<pubDate>Sun, 15 Mar 2015 13:58:53 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[kevinhsu]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://www.nhkeu.co.uk/?p=3233</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<strong>各位在英华人消费者/网民：</strong>

2015年3月14号晚，在微信朋友圈中发生了针对“拿回扣”购物ＡＰＰ的恶意谣言事件，严重损害了英国华人消费者的正当权益。为维护广大在英华人消费者权益和网民的知情权，针对此事件本公司现发表以下正式声明：

Glenmere Technology Ltd 是一家注册在英国的移动互联网公司，旗下的“<strong>拿回扣”购物ＡＰＰ是一款专注于英国华人奢侈品线下购物返利的手机软件</strong>，于２０１５年２月２８号正式上线。<strong>软件旨在为在英工作，学习，生活的华人朋友提供更多高端购物的返利优惠。</strong>软件上线两周内，得到了广大消费者的热烈欢迎，软件的注册量和使用量节节攀升。

在２０１５年３月１４号晚，微信朋友圈中开始出现针对<strong>“拿回扣”ＡＰＰ的恶意诽谤，谣言散布者恶意中伤软件</strong>，发布诸如“有不法之徒在网上发布的拿回扣ＡＰＰ带有病毒，不要打开，立刻删除”等文字，还谎称“新闻中已经播放该消息”等虚假信息，鼓动不知情的网民进行转发，此事件对于本公司，软件用户以及广大在英华人消费者造成了极其恶劣的传播影响。

据调查，<strong>该事件系某些个人和小团体担心“拿回扣”ＡＰＰ向广大消费者提供返利优惠后，影响了这部分人的既得利益，而动用非法手段</strong>，捏造虚假信息利用微信平台进行传播。本公司法务部门将动用法律手段向谣言始作俑者发送律师信，追究其法律责任，维护软件用户的合法权益。

<strong>在此，敬告各位网民，在不知情的情况下，不要轻易转发传播此类谣言，以免由于传播范围的扩大导致巨大的社会危害，导致您个人被追究连带的法律责任。</strong>

就谣言中所涉及的软件的一些列安全性问题，本公司作出以下回复：

１.　关于软件安全问题，本公司的“拿回扣”ＡＰＰ经过一年的开发，投资超过上百万人民币，是经过苹果商店和Google Play审核认证，并在其网上商店发布供网民免费下载的返利软件。<strong>所有经过苹果公司和谷歌公司审核并发布的软件在安全性上都不存在任何问题</strong>，否则苹果公司或谷歌公司也将要承担相关法律责任。请各位消费者放心下载和使用。

２.　关于信息安全问题，由于软件的功能中涉及消费后返利的功能，的确需要消费者提供个人账户信息，但本公司有着一套完善的个人信息保护系统，保证用户的信息安全，不会泄露给第三方。<strong>本</strong><strong>公司是英国信息管理局ICO的注册单位，拥有该监管部门发放的Data Protection注册牌照，注册号：No.ZA104520，</strong>可以通过ＩＣＯ官网进行查询：www.ico.org.uk

3. 关于支付安全问题，消费者通过软件进入商店后，直接向商家进行购物支付。本软件只提供返利信息和返利记录，<strong>并不参与支付过程，根本不涉及任何银行卡交易</strong>，自然不存在任何支付安全的问题！

特别提醒各位网民，<strong>不法分子无处不在</strong>，在网上要做好相关的信息辨识工作，以免在无意识的情况下，被不法分子利用，而承担相应法律责任！

<strong>在此要感谢广大消费者和网民对于“拿回扣”APP和本公司一如既往的支持和信赖，我们将会为大家提供更好的服务以及更多的优惠购物体验！</strong>

Glenmere Technology Ltd

2015年3月15号]]></content:encoded>
		<excerpt:encoded><![CDATA[]]></excerpt:encoded>
